# Template

Reading time: `r ifelse(file.size("index.qmd")/2000 <= 1.5, '<1 minute', paste0(round(file.size("index.qmd")/2000), ' minutes'))`

This is a template post for the galiwatch blog!

To make a new post:

1.  copy & rename the template folder
2.  edit title and date in `index.qmd` of the new directory
3.  when you're ready to publish, set `draft: false`
4.  click 'render' (or ctrl + shift + k)
5.  go to git -\> add all -\> commit -\> pull -\> push

To add an image: type `/image` . The first image inserted will be the thumbnail!

Have fun :))
